testCase.name: MCard Client Error Handling should throw ValidationError for empty content
MCard Client Error Handling should throw ValidationError for extremely long content
MCard Client Content Validation should validate content length
MCard Client Content Validation should allow creating card with special characters
MCard Client Advanced Content Validation should handle object content validation
MCard Client Logging should log debug information when debug is enabled
MCard Client Logging should log at different levels
MCard Client Logging should respect log level
MCard Client Advanced Error Handling should throw specific error types
MCard Client Advanced Error Handling should throw NotFoundError when retrieving non-existent card
MCard Client Advanced Configuration should allow custom base URL and timeout
MCard Client Advanced Configuration should handle missing or invalid configuration
MCard Client Advanced Configuration should allow custom logger
MCard Client Client Configuration should allow custom base URL
MCard Client Client Configuration should use default configuration when no options provided
MCard Client Card Operations should create a card successfully
MCard Client Card Operations should get a card successfully
MCard Client Card Operations should delete a card successfully
MCard Client Card Operations should return true when deleting a non-existent card
MCard Client List and Search Cards should list cards with default parameters
MCard Client List and Search Cards should search cards by content
MCard Client List and Search Cards should search cards by hash
MCard Client List and Search Cards should search cards by time
MCard Client List and Search Cards should handle pagination
MCard Client MCard Client Advanced Content Tests should create cards with various binary content types
MCard Client MCard Client Advanced Content Tests should handle complex nested content
MCard Client MCard Client Advanced Content Tests should handle large content near size limits
